sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"疏忽，忽略"或"忘记"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: forget, omit, neglect, overlook, disregard, ignore
means: forget ： 普通用词，侧重某事不重要或太复杂而未能记住，也指有意疏忽或忘掉。
omit ： 指有意或无意地忘记做某事，也指删去被视作不重要、不合意的东西。
neglect ： 侧重指有意的忽略或忽视，也可指粗心与疏忽。
overlook ： 指因匆忙而疏忽或视而不见。
disregard ： 多指有意或自觉地不顾某事。
ignore ： 通常指有意不顾，或不理显而易见的事物。

entry.def: If you forget something or forget how to do something, you cannot think of it or think how to do it, although you knew it or knew how to do it in the past.

example.ex: Sometimes I improvise and change the words because I forget them...
example.tran: 有时，我临场发挥改了词，因为我把原来的词给忘了。

example.ex: She forgot where she left the car and it took us two days to find it.
example.tran: 她忘记把车子停在什么地方了，我们花了两天时间才找到。

entry.def: If you forget something or forget to do it, you fail to think about it or fail to remember to do it, for example because you are thinking about other things.

example.ex: She never forgets her daddy's birthday...
example.tran: 她从来不会忘记老爸的生日。

example.ex: She forgot to lock her door one day and two men got in...
example.tran: 有一天她忘了锁门，两个男人溜了进来。

entry.def: If you forget something that you had intended to bring with you, you do not bring it because you did not think about it at the right time.

example.ex: Once when we were going to Paris, I forgot my passport.
example.tran: 有一次我们准备去巴黎时，我忘了带护照。

entry.def: If you forget something or someone, you deliberately put them out of your mind and do not think about them any more.

example.ex: I hope you will forget the bad experience you had today...
example.tran: 我希望你不要把今天遇到的倒霉事放在心上。
我无法不去想发生的事。

entry.def: If you forget yourself, you behave in an uncontrolled or unacceptable way, which is not the way in which you usually behave.

example.ex: He was so fascinated by her beauty that he forgot himself and leaned across to touch her.
example.tran: 他为她的美貌所倾倒，以至于忘乎所以地靠上前去触摸她。

entry.def: You say 'Forget it' in reply to someone as a way of telling them not to worry or bother about something, or as an emphatic way of saying no to a suggestion.
entry.tran: 没关系;不必在意;不要再提了

example.ex: 'Sorry, Liz. I think I was a bit rude to you.' —
'Forget it, but don't do it again!'...
example.tran: “抱歉，莉兹。我想我刚才对你有点粗鲁。”——“没关系，但是别再那样做了!”

entry.def: You say not forgetting a particular thing or person when you want to include them in something that you have already talked about.

example.ex: The first thing is to support as many shows as one can, not forgetting the small local ones.
example.tran: 首先要尽可能多地支持演出，这其中也包括当地的小型演出。

means.word_mean: 1. dismiss from the mind; stop remembering;

sentences.sentence: "i tried to bury these unpleasant memories"

"Don't forget to call the chairman of the board to the meeting!"
"I forgot my umbrella in the restaurant"
"I left my keys inside the car and locked the doors"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English forgietan, of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch vergeten and German vergessen, and ultimately to for- and get

sentences.en: In their eagerness to build bigger telescopes, they forgot that science is not the only way of understanding the world.

sentences.cn: 你会轻易为生活难题所困扰，忘记暂时抛开这些纷扰，去感激你所拥有的一切。

sentences.en: Within a few generations, most had forgotten their native tongues.

sentences.en: Each time you remember the new PIN, you gradually forget the old one.

sentences.cn: 但是随着人们渐渐认识到遗忘的重要性，当前的研究开始更加重视我们会在什么条件下忘记信息。
sentences.en: But current studies are beginning to place greater emphasis on the conditions under which we forget, as its importance begins to be more appreciated.
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 例如，忘记一部特别喜欢的电影中的某个演员的名字，根本不必担心。但是如果你忘记了这部电影的情节，或者甚至不记得看过这部电影，这种情况则让人担忧得多，达夫勒说道。
sentences.en: Forgetting the name of an actor in a favorite movie, for example, isnothing to worry about. But if you forget the plot of the movie or don't remember even seeing it, that's far more concerning, Daffner says.
sentences.from: 18年6月四级真题(第二套)| 阅读

sentences.cn: 一些老年人由于记忆力差, 常忘记或重复服药.
sentences.en: As some of the elderly poor memory, and often forget or repeat medication.

sentences.cn: 祝你好运, 住宿安全,不要忘记邀请您的朋友.
sentences.en: Good luck, stay safe and do not forget to invite your friends.

sentences.cn: 多娜名利双收, 尽管如此, 她从未忘记自己的故乡.
sentences.en: Donna won fame and fortune, notwithstanding, she never forgot her hometown.

sentences.cn: 什么地方可以洗脑, 让我忘记快乐, 忘记伤痛, 忘记自己?
sentences.en: Where is OK brainwashing, let me forget joy, forget pain, forget oneself?

sentences.cn: 请一定不要忘记离家前你父母对你说过的话.
sentences.en: Be sure not to forget what your parents said to you before you left home.

sentences.cn: “ 我不会忘记的, "嘉莉说, 当她走时又看了她一眼.
sentences.en: " I won't forget,'said Carrie, casting a glance at her as she went away.
sentences.from: 英汉文学 - 嘉莉妹妹

sentences.cn: 该心怀满足而忘记河的另一边.
sentences.en: Now you know the truth , love , now forget and be content.

sentences.cn: 我还没忘记你父亲给我取的诨名呢.
sentences.en: I've not forgotten the nickname your father gave me.

sentences.cn: 谢谢, 杰克. 坦白地说我倒宁愿忘记自己的生日.
sentences.en: A: Thank you, Jack. To be frank, I'd rather forget my birthday.

sentences.cn: 不要忘记那个负号.
sentences.en: Don't forget the minus sign.

sentences.cn: 随着时间的流逝, 他们忘却了所遭受的苦难.
sentences.en: With the passage of time, they forgot their bitter sufferings.

sentences.cn: 人的欲望总是无穷, 永远不会被忘却.
sentences.en: For all humans desire at one point to be immortal, not to be forgotten.

sentences.cn: 我们还是别提那些不如忘却的事情吧.
sentences.en: Let's not rake over things that we would rather forget.

sentences.cn: 他们的亲属关系早被忘却,他们不变的足印的符号并没有消灭.
sentences.en: Those marks of their constant tread have noteffaced though their kinship has been long forgotten.

sentences.cn: 你所收集的一切, 无论是曾经无比珍贵的抑或是早已忘却的, 都将传递给他人.
sentences.en: All the things you collected, whether treasured or forgotten, will pass to somebody else.

sentences.cn: 先用心学之, 而后再用心忘却.
sentences.en: Hear the soundless. Learn it all , then forget it all.

sentences.cn: 愿知道圣诞节会即将来临的人们,忘却和宽恕以往的一切不快, 让我们携手共进吧!
sentences.en: May who say that Christmas Day will come around forget and forgive the bygones. Touch hands.

sentences.cn: 于是恋人被忘却, 忧愁被撇开, 死亡也看不见了.
sentences.en: Thus lovers are forgotten, sorrows laid aside , death hidden from view.
sentences.from: 英汉文学 - 嘉莉妹妹

sentences.cn: 我总是将它牢记在心,永不忘却.
sentences.en: I never forget it and always bear it in my mind.

sentences.cn: 然后暂时忘却这件事, 当时机到来的时候, 需要就自然能得到满足了.
sentences.en: Then forget it a while. When the time comes, the need will be met.

sentences.cn: 原谅、忘却,你会宁静祥和地活在每一个瞬间.
sentences.en: Forgive and forget and you will live every moment in peace.

sentences.cn: 真挚恋爱过的心永不忘却.
sentences.en: The heart that once truly loves never forgets.

sentences.cn: 当生活之门打开的时候,痛苦 、 烦恼、兴奋等种种表情的人生态度都忘却, 只保留从容的乐观心态.
sentences.en: When gate of the life opens time, we can forget the worry. we can be happy.

sentences.cn: 忘却喧嚣浮躁的尘世, 忘却世俗的纷争, 是不是一种享受?
sentences.en: Forget about the outside world the city impetuous, forget secular strife, is not an enjoyment?

sentences.cn: 我想回答, 但是我们的语言迷失而又忘却了.
sentences.en: I tried to answer, but our language had been lost and forgotten.

sentences.cn: 我要忘却过去发生的一切.
sentences.en: I will forget the happenings of the day that is gone.

sentences.cn: 他们正在反抗逼迫他们去庆祝和忘却的中国官员.
sentences.en: They are resisting pressure by Chinese officials to celebrate and forget.

sentences.cn: 宽恕要比忘却好.
sentences.en: It is better to forgive than forget.

sentences.cn: 分手吧, 趁情热季节未把我们忘却.
sentences.en: Let us part, ere the season of passion forget us.

sentences.cn: 随着时间的消逝,那个事件被忘却了.
sentences.en: With the passage of time the incident was forgotten.

sentences.cn: 演讲稿一篇接一篇记忆,都没有忘却.
sentences.en: Memorize one speech another without forgetting.

sentences.cn: 可要忘却一个人却需要终生的时间.
sentences.en: But it takes a life time to forget someone.

sentences.cn: 童年是一段忘却的旅程.
sentences.en: Childhood is a forgotten journey.

sentences.cn: 有个地方被暂时忘却了, 并必须如此.
sentences.en: For the time being a place was forgotten. And It'should be so.

sentences.cn: 明智的忘却对工作记忆的效率很重要.
sentences.en: Judicious forgetting is critical to the efficiency of working memory.

sentences.cn: 艺术可以勾起所有的伤痛, 也可以忘却所有的伤痛.
sentences.en: Art can bring back all pain, and you can also forget all the pain.

sentences.cn: 要忘却过去的错误,朝着未来更伟大的成就坚定地前进.
sentences.en: To forget the mistakes of the past and press onthe greater achievements of the future.

sentences.cn: 忘却了那过去的现在和来世乃至永远的灾难与不幸!
sentences.en: Forget that the past is always present and the afterlife as well as disaster and misfortune!

sentences.cn: 同样地, 他们也容易忘却不在眼前的人.
sentences.en: Likewise, they tend to forget about people who are not present.

sentences.cn: 为了把烦恼忘却, 他让自己忙于花园的工作.
sentences.en: To forget his trouble, he busied himself in his garden.

sentences.cn: 父母在过多地关注孩子使用数码产品的同时,往往容易忽略自己对数码产品的使用
sentences.en: With so much focus on children’s use of screens, it's easy for parents to forget about their own screen use.

sentences.cn: 遥远的西部, 是一个忽略了此激烈争论的地方.
sentences.en: In the far West, one could forget this bitter dispute.

sentences.cn: 不过记得不要忽略了甜蜜轻柔的接吻方式.
sentences.en: Be careful not to forget the value of a sweet and slow kiss.

sentences.cn: 我有没有 顾此失彼,忽略了对人的承诺,忘了做一些应做的事?
sentences.en: Did I ignore my commitments? Did I forget anything I should do?

sentences.cn: 忘记 、 忽略或是割断这种联系,艺术生命就会枯竭.
sentences.en: Creativity withers when these ties are forgotten, neglected or severed.

sentences.cn: 在这些被忽略的公共卫生死角中,可有 “ 他人 ” 的概念?
sentences.en: Is there any consciousness of the'others'at these forgotten corners of public health?

sentences.cn: 好像同自己订下的契约, 它们更难被忽略或遗忘.
sentences.en: Like a contract with yourself, are harder to neglect or forget.

sentences.cn: 寻找面具时可不要太过匆忙,这样会使你忽略许多金钱. 偷取1400单位的财宝.
sentences.en: Don't let your rush for the masks make you forget value of money. Get 1400 loot.

sentences.cn: 所以许多人都没听说这个变化, 有的人忽略了这个消息, 有的人干脆把它忘记了.
sentences.en: Many people not hear of the change, others chose to ignore it, while some merely forgot.

sentences.cn: 雅尔塔协定的批评者都倾向于忽略俄国也作了重大让步.
sentences.en: Critics of the Yalta agreements tend to forget that the Russian, also, made substantial concessions.

sentences.cn: 人们很容易忽略银行和其他借贷机构也需要赚钱养活自己.
sentences.en: It's easy to forget that banks and other lending institutions actually need to earn money themselves.

sentences.cn: 他说,人民通常忽略了这样一个事实,那就是,在萨达姆的统治下,伊拉克并不是一个稳定的国家.
sentences.en: He said people often forget that Iraq was not a stable country under Saddam Hussein.

sentences.cn: 可能我忽略了你, 你也忘了我的重要.
sentences.en: Possible I to neglect you, you also forgotten my unimportance.

sentences.cn: 很遗憾我忽略了在这个海滩上应该穿上凉鞋之类的东西.
sentences.en: To my regret, I forgot to wear sandals or something like that here on this beach.

sentences.cn: 鼓吹平民主义的政治家们忽略了一点,那就是法官对情节相对较严重的犯罪行为往往都有不容改变的看法.
sentences.en: Populist politicians forgot that judges tend to have fixed ideas about the relative seriousness of offences.

sentences.cn: 所以你认为我们应该不要理这件事并且忽略我们看见过的一切.
sentences.en: So you both think we should dump this thing and forget we ever met it.

sentences.cn: 他们有意忽略了患心脏病的风险。
sentences.en: They've conveniently forgotten the risk of heart disease.

sentences.cn: 由于他没有设警报器的疏忽而致使布赖恩的公寓被洗劫一空.
sentences.en: He forgets to set the alarm and Brian's apartment is burglarised.

sentences.cn: 如果忘记了, 我们也会在最终发现疏忽时进行改正.
sentences.en: If we forget, we fix it when we eventually discover the omission.

sentences.cn: 我偶尔疏忽忘了把你的信寄出去.
sentences.en: " By an oversight, I forgot to post your letter. "

sentences.cn: 平息一场争吵.找到一位被疏忽的朋友.
sentences.en: Mend a quarrel. search out a forgotten friend.

sentences.cn: 他因疏忽了一些家务事而受到责备.
sentences.en: He was scolded for his forgotten chores.

sentences.cn: 我把我的雨伞遗落在饭店里了.
sentences.en: I forgot my umbrella in the restaurant.

sentences.cn: 生命的游戏一下子就结束, 生命的玩具一件件遗落在后面,然后都被忘记掉.
sentences.en: Life's play is swift, Life's playthings fall behind one by one and are forgotten.

sentences.cn: 但我感到一种更深层的病症: 许多公司似乎已经忘掉商业是怎么回事了.
sentences.en: But I sense a deeper malaise: many companies seem to have forgotten what business is about.

sentences.cn: 忘掉青霉素 、 计算机,甚至大爆炸吧, 跳过所有那些风行的问题.
sentences.en: Forget about penicillin , digital computers and even the Big Bang, fads all of them.

sentences.cn: 《廊桥遗梦》: 连记忆都可以忘掉, 但爱与伦理却不能!
sentences.en: The Bridges of Madison County: you can forget anything, but not love and morality.

sentences.cn: 他开始讨论我们已经历过的一切困难, 但我告诉他,这只不过是早已过去的事,最好把它忘掉.
sentences.en: He started to discuss all the difficulties we had been through, but I told him it was just so much water under the bridge and that it would be best to forget.

sentences.cn: 忘掉伱没有得以顺利实施的计划.
sentences.en: Forget about the plans that didn't seem to work out right.

sentences.cn: 我们必须调整好自己的状态, 尽快忘掉现在的场景.
sentences.en: We must adjust our condition, forgets present's scene as soon as possible.

sentences.cn: 他们忘掉了凯文·伊根, 他却不曾忘记他们.
sentences.en: They have forgotten Kevin Egan, not he them.

sentences.cn: 在世事的喧嚣和纷扰中, 我们常常忘掉自己的心灵.
sentences.en: In the world of noise and confusion, we often forget their own souls.

sentences.cn: 我早就忘掉我们为什么吵架了.
sentences.en: I've long since forgotten what our quarrel was about.

sentences.cn: 刚刚发过的誓已经忘掉了, 已被那阵疾风吹得无影无踪了.
sentences.en: His vows of a moment before were forgotten, swept away in that great swift wind.

sentences.cn: 忘掉失败,不过要牢记失败中的教训.
sentences.en: Forget the failure but remember the leason.

sentences.cn: 我无法忘掉悲惨的往事.
sentences.en: I cannot forget the sad past.

sentences.cn: 海明威成为傻瓜福克纳忘掉艺术的东西.
sentences.en: Hemingway play the fool and Faulkner forget his art.

sentences.cn: 咱们忘掉那些烦恼的事吧.
sentences.en: Let's forget about those worries.

sentences.cn: 我暂时忘掉了过去积聚的忧愁和烦躁.
sentences.en: For a time I have forgotten the worries and irritations I was nurturing before.

sentences.cn: 极端唯物主义使人忘掉精神价值.
sentences.en: Crass materialism causes people to forget spiritual values.

sentences.cn: 时间流逝之后, 特别是流逝得久远久远之后, 人们就把它们忘掉了.
sentences.en: After a while, especially after a long while, people forget.

sentences.cn: 在回忆里总结, 忘掉以前的不快, 留下曾经的美好.
sentences.en: In memory of summing up, forget the unhappy past, leaving the once beautiful.

sentences.cn: 实际上,他们可以帮助人们忘掉烦恼.
sentences.en: Actually they can help people forget their problems.

sentences.cn: 我想看看你,告诉你,忘掉那些不愉快.
sentences.en: I wanna see your face and say forget it just from spite.

sentences.cn: 要看见月亮, 你必须忘掉指月的手指, 只看月亮.
sentences.en: To see the moon, you must forget the pointing finger, and simply look at the moon.

sentences.cn: 他要给她写出来,以防她忘掉.
sentences.en: He offered to write it out for her lest she should forget it.

sentences.cn: 鬼怪的事,已不知忘掉到什么地方去了.
sentences.en: Ghosts are entirely forgotten.

sentences.cn: 奥迪列?尼尔内女士: 她原本就不想出名. 跟她有类似经历的人只是想忘掉过去的成就辉煌.
sentences.en: Ms. ODILE NEARNE: She didn't want to be famous. People like her just want to forget.

sentences.cn: 此次金融危机决非一段微不足道 、 乃至可以很快忘掉的小插曲.
sentences.en: This financial crisis was no minor blip, to be forgotten as quickly as possible.

sentences.cn: 我想大多数人设法, 但却没法忘掉你!
sentences.en: I think that most people would try, but not be able to forget you!

sentences.cn: 我只想忘掉自己的生日!
sentences.en: It was my birthday I wanted to forget!

sentences.cn: 总统对这个问题采取中立态度, 希望公众会忘掉它.
sentences.en: The president is straddling the fence on this issue, hoping the public will forget it.

sentences.cn: 罗斯把他们的约会全忘掉了.
sentences.en: Rose had forgotten all about their appointment.

sentences.cn: 没有一个歌唱家忘掉过歌词, 没有一个钢琴家弹错过.
sentences.en: Not one singer forgot a word, not a pianist faulted.

sentences.cn: 然而, 我们也不能忽视口香糖的副面作用.
sentences.en: However, we must not forget the negative side of chewing gum.

sentences.cn: 我们时常会在日常单调的工作中迷失自我, 忽视了在琐碎工作之外真实的自己.
sentences.en: Sometime's we lose perspective the daily grind, completely forgetting who we are outside the routine.

sentences.cn: 忽视或忘记过去无异于篡改历史，凡是读过《动物农场》的人都知道那会导致什么后果。
sentences.en: To neglect or forget aspects of the past is tantamount to rewriting history, and anyone who has read Animal Farm knows where that can lead.

Sentence.sentence: Why learning and forgetting are complementary.

Where are you in the cycle of renewal: Are you actively preserving the present, or selectively forgetting the past, or boldly creating the future? What advice would Leah give you to move you ahead on your journey? Once we're on the path of growth, we can continually move through the seasons of transformation and renewal.
When people tend to forget.
What contributes to forgetting.
Previous behavioural studies have shown that learning new information can lead to forgetting.
Normal forgetting may even be a safety mechanism to ensure our brain doesn't become too full.
It can be very hard to forget embarrassing moments, says Donohue.
In daily life, forgetting actually has clear advantages.
In a sense, forgetting is our brain's way of sorting memories, so the most relevant memories are ready for retrieval.
Each time you remember the new PIN, you gradually forget the old one.
But current studies are beginning to place greater emphasis on the conditions under which we forget, as its importance begins to be more appreciated.
So if you really want to do your job well, don’t forget to get some sleep.
The point is not to excuse or forget the crime.
There are many examples of the vast harm that is caused when individuals forget or ignore the effect their dishonesty can have.
Let's not forget that electric vehicles are cleaner.
"It can be very hard to forget embarrassing moments," says Donohue.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月四级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Certainly, you don't want to waste your precious hours on following the developments in a disorderly fashion, and miss important deadlines, confuse interview times or forget to follow up as a result.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Francesca Haass, a senior at middlebury, says, "I find the in-class ones are more stressful in the short term, but there is immediate relief as you swallow information like mad, and then you get to forget it all."
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: So if you really want to do your job well, don't forget to get some sleep.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: When you forget entire experiences, he says, that's "a red flag that something more serious may be involved."
Sentence.come: 2018年6月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C
